item.title: Headicon?
item.dc:creator: @pastaway pastaway
item.description:
@pastaway wrote:

so i was looking through my clients client.java folder and player.java to figure out how im going to add this donor icon above donors heads and i found this hinticon

[QUOTE]
public void updatePlayer(Stream stream)
{
stream.currentOffset = 0;
anInt1702 = stream.readUnsignedByte();
headIcon = stream.readUnsignedByte();
skullIcon = stream.readUnsignedByte();
donorIcon = stream.readUnsignedByte();
(here)—>//hintIcon = stream.readUnsignedByte();[/QUOTE]
thing but it looks like its disabled and when i removed the // from it, compiled, and ran my client… it just froze up so i had to readd…
what is it for and what does it do and how would i get it to work ?_?
because if its some kind of icon above a players head then i could change to the donor symbol im trying to work on

Read full topic
